mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.banji_id as banjiId ,a.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,a.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,a.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,a.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,a.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.xuesheng_content as xueshengContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,banji.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,banji.banji_name as banjiName ,banji.banji_address as banjiAddress ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM xuesheng a left JOIN banji banji ON a.banji_id = banji.id left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.banji_id = #{params.banjiId} )
and a.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and a.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and a.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.xuesheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.banji_id IS NOT NULL
and banji.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and banji.banji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiName},'%')
and banji.banji_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.banjiAddress},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(banji.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(banji.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
